Caption: The academic procession, consisting of the Senate members, wends through the Open Air Theatre (OAT), as the audience stands
Description: The dignitaries include (from left): Prof. A. Ramachandran, Director, Prof. S. Sampath, Dr. K. S. G. Doss, Chemicals and Plastics India Ltd., Madras, Dr. G. S. Laddha, Director, A. C. College of Technology, Madras, dignitary (yet to be identified) and Mr. T. R. Doss, Director of Technical Education, Government of Andhra Pradesh, Hyderabad.
